content: **you ll love this beautifully textured blanket pattern - comes in 5 sizes ** try the cobblestone pathways blanket pattern this blanket is beginner-friendly and works up quickly use neutral yarn or choose a bright color for more pizzaz **pattern highlights** // alternatging moss stitch and decrease row create a gorgeous texture and a single-color striped look // written & video instructions included **sizes** baby - 30x36 square baby - 36x36 toddler/lap - 36x48 throw - 54x66 twin - 60x88 **suggested yarn** hobby lobby i love this yarn in the shade linen **hooks used** j 10/6 0 i 9/5 5
